critique: The executive order seems to want the audience to feel joy and surprise. The order is about a woman who is being appointed to a position in the Treasury Department. This is a positive thing, so it should evoke joy. The fact that she is being appointed without regard to the length of time she has been separated from the service is surprising, so it should evoke surprise.The order does not seem to want the audience to feel sadness, anger, fear, or disgust.
